headline: Resilient Demand and Strategic Upgrades Drive XOM's Refining Success
summary: ExxonMobil's refining arm gains as cheaper crude, tight product supply and strategic refinery upgrades enable it to remain competitive.

headline: Earnings Preview: What To Expect From Valero Energy's Report
